Description.Nationalite: I come from France, more specifically from Pontarlier.
Description.Experience: 1 year of experience as a self-taught front-end developer.
Description.Diplome: Associate's degree in Web Integration and a Bachelor's in Telecom and Networks
Description.Competences: Developer, coding and UX/UI enthusiast, designer

Projects.ChezValerie: Developed in HTML, SASS, Vanilla JS, and PHP. Designed to provide an optimal UI/UX experience. Performance was a priority, as well as accessibility. The PHP-coded form protects against XSS and CSRF attacks, among other security measures. Integration of Google Captcha & Maps.
Projects.BJTreklife: Developed in NextJS, Redux, SASS for the front-end and NodeJS, Express, MongoDB for the back-end. UI/UX design and conception done by myself. The site is responsive and has been optimized for SEO. The back-end is secured with JWT tokens. The site is hosted on Vercel and the database on MongoDB Atlas.
Projects.ArgentBank: Developed in React with Vite, integrating Redux, SASS and Axios for the front-end. Based on a provided design, I did the integration and set up the authentication with JWT. Also, I implemented a state management system with Redux and contributed to the definition of the Transactions routes of the API.

Skills.Text: Guided by unwavering determination, steadfast patience, and a burning passion, I always strive to achieve excellence in each of my projects. Because simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
